name: 1-800-Oncologist
tag_list: oncolgist, cancer, oncology, patient-education, cancer-news, digital-media, health-information
overview:
1-800-Oncologist serves as the cancer community’s premier destination for patient education and appointment solutions, connecting thousands of prospective patients with cancer treatment centers nationwide each month. A member-only network for cancer specialists, 1-800-Oncologist offers digital media solutions designed to maximize appointment productivity and enhance coordination of care with both new and existing patients.

The company’s toll-free voice portal enables individuals to easily locate and speak directly with cancer specialists and treatment centers in their area. 1-800-Oncologist’s Pay-Per-Conversation advertising service is a ROI-centric solution offering providers the flexibility to choose their target market while staying within their marketing budget.

The 1-800-Oncologist.com website features the leading consumer-centric cancer news and information, from breaking news and video segments to treatment options and medication updates. The company’s timely, easy-to-understand content enables patients to more effectively communicate with their doctors and play an active role in managing their health.

1-800-Oncologist’s Total Patient Engagement (TPE) suite is designed to help providers attract new patients, increase patient satisfaction, and build patient loyalty. The company’s TPE offering enables providers to syndicate co-branded patient education at key touch points throughout care delivery via online, social media, print, and mobile platforms.
